REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2460 reute r f BC-GATEWAY-<GMSI.O>-RECI 06-19 0054

TEXT.TITLE: GATEWAY <GMSI.O> RECINDS OFFER FOR WESTWORLD
TEXT.BODY: Gateway Medical Systems Inc said it has withdrawn its May 27 offer to acquire <Westworld Community Healthcare Inc>. The company said it remains interested in acquiring the Westworld's hospitals and will attempt to continue negotiations with Westworld. Reuter
